headline: Assessing MarketAxess After a 66.6% Five Year Slide and Premium Valuation Ratios
summary: If you are wondering whether MarketAxess Holdings is a hidden bargain or a value trap at today’s prices, you are not alone. That is exactly what we are going to unpack here. The stock has bounced about 1.2% over the last week and 8.3% in the last month, but it is still down 19.6% year to date and 20.1% over the last year, with a painful 66.6% slide over five years from prior highs. Those swings have come as investors reassess electronic bond trading platforms and how much growth is left in...

headline: The Bull Case For MarketAxess (MKTX) Could Change Following New Buyback And EM Trading Milestone
summary: MarketAxess Holdings Inc. recently announced a new share repurchase program of up to US$400,000,000 and revealed it has surpassed US$1 trillion in traded Emerging Markets debt this year, underpinned by operations across 30 local currency and more than 100 hard currency bond markets. By launching a fully-electronic workflow for Indian Government Bonds and becoming the only fixed income electronic platform covering 100% of the J.P. Morgan GBI-EM Index, MarketAxess is reinforcing its role at...
